name: CI - Café y Más

on:
  push:
    branches: ["main"]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout del repositorio
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Build Backend
        run: |
          cd backend
          ./mvnw clean package

      - name: Build Frontend
        run: |
          cd frontend
          npm install
          npm run build
